docs.title: Welcome to Light Chinese

docs.text: Pinyin dissected This page is not ordered alphabetically. It is updated progressively as I record the shadow practice series. When I see a new Pinyin that is not here, I will add it at the bottom. I think the best way to utilize this page is to leverage the search function in the broswer. Press Contrl-F, then put in the Pinyin you want to learn, if there is a hit, then shadow it!! ni 声母 Initial: n, ne rd Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: i, n ee d Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: nì, ne at Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: nī ní nǐ nì Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , yao 声母 Initial: y, n ee d Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: ao, ou r Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: yao, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: yāo yáo yǎo yào Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , neng 声母 Initial: n, ne rd Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: eng, ___(like a bee) Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: neng, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: nēng néng něng nèng Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , jin 声母 Initial: j, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: in, en glish Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: jin, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: jīn jín jǐn jìn Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , de 声母 Initial: d, learn ed Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: e, a bout Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: de, learn ed Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: dē dé dě dè Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , qu 声母 Initial: q, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: ü, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: qu, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags !!(When ü follows j/q/x, it is written as u, but still pronounced as ü. When the naughty j/q/x sees the fish eyes (two dots above u), it takes out the eyes. ) 声调 Tone: qū qú qǔ qù Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , chu 声母 Initial: ch, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: u, b oo k Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: chu, ___ Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: chū chú chǔ chù Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 , lai 声母 Initial: l, l ucky Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 韵母 Final: ai, I Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 拼音 Pinyin: lài, li ke Your browser doesn’t support audio tags 声调 Tone: lāi lái lǎi lài Your browser doesn’t support audio tags Used in: 5 ,

docs.text: Light Chinese 1 别过去 Don’t go over there 他来啦 He is coming Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-05-26 20:21:01 Shadow Practice Journey to the West Pronouncing bié guò qù 别 过 去 tā lái lā 他 来 啦 Meaning 别过去 Don’t go over there 他来啦 He is coming Shadowing Writing References Video: youtu.be/K3KNpyKILHM YouTube looper: www.infinitelooper.com Writing: www.hanzi5.com

docs.text: Light Chinese 4 谁敢进去 Who dares get in 我敢进去 I’ll go 你敢去 Dare you Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-05-29 06:55:02 Shadow Practice Journey to the West Pronouncing shuí gǎn jìn qù 谁敢进去？ wǒ gǎn jìn qù 我敢进去。 nǐ gǎn qù 你敢去？ Meaning 谁 who 敢 dare 我 I, me 谁敢进去？ Who dares get in? 我敢进去。 I’ll go. 你敢去？ Dare you? Shadowing Writing References Video: youtu.be/K3KNpyKILHM YouTube looper: www.infinitelooper.com Writing: www.hanzi5.com

docs.text: Light Chinese 5 你要能进得去出得来 If you can get in and come out Author Roden Luo 罗登 Time 2020-06-02 19:53:50 Shadow Practice Journey to the West Pronouncing nǐ yào néng 你 要 能 jìn dé qù 进 得 去 chū dé lái 出 得 来 Meaning 你要能 If you can 进得去 get in 出得来 come out Shadowing Typing ni yao neng jin de qu chu de lai 你要能进得去出得来 var typing_box = document.getElementById("Typing"); typing_box.onkeyup = function () { if (this.value.length === 0) { this.className = '' return } if (this.value == "你要能进得去出得来") { this.className = 'valid' } else { this.className = 'invalid' } } Choose a Chinese input method you like. I’m using Sogou Pinyin ( Wiki , official link ). Writing References Video: youtu.be/K3KNpyKILHM YouTube looper: www.infinitelooper.com Writing: www.hanzi5.com var links = document.links; for (var i = 0, linksLength = links.length; i < linksLength; i++) { if (links[i].href.indexOf("pinyin") > -1) { links[i].target = '_blank'; } } // var imgs = document.images; // for (var i = 0, imgsLength = imgs.length; i < imgsLength; i++) { // if (imgs[i].src.indexOf("hanzi5") > -1) { // imgs[i].width = 150; // imgs[i].height = 150; // } // }
